name: Council of Mages: The Party Game
name_original: Council of Mages: The Party Game
description:
Looking for a fun game to enjoy with friends, family, and even dear old grandma? Gather up to 6 players and play a series of thrilling challenges! Brace yourself for these epic minigames that will put your friendships to the ultimate test and determine who is worthy of a seat on the Council, established by the legendary master, Gwydion. Dominate the minigames to snag cool advantages and unite forces to build a bridge, leading you to the ultimate test!

Who will prove his worth and join the council?




Betray your friends with the poisoned cake to be last standing and win more points! Or take them down in an intense Sumo tank battle! Play different minigames to test your skills, logic, and luck!




All the players strategically place their bricks to build a path to the council. Once it's done, race it in the most important test of the trial to win your place on the council.




From 2 to 6 players, choose your banner and represent your color during the trial of the council!




Choose your magician hat, the robe that fits you best, and your magical tool!


Use your mobile device as a controller to play Council of mages!
